howItWorks.title: Use Picoo AI Hairstyle Changer In 3 Easy Steps

0.title: Upload Your Picture
0.description: Start with a clear, front-facing photo in good lighting. The better your image quality, the more accurate your AI preview will be.

1.title: Describe Your Desired Hairstyle
1.description: Type a hairstyle prompt in natural language. Be specific about style, length, bangs, and hair color for the best result.

2.title: View Your New Hairstyle Instantly
2.description: In seconds, get a realistic AI hairstyle preview. Save the result, share it for feedback, or try more ideas until it's perfect.

0.title: Hyper-Realistic AI Hairstyle Changer
0.description: Unlike generic filters, Picoo AI Hairstyle Changer analyzes facial structure, skin tone, and features to generate a hyper-realistic preview that still looks like you. It considers face shape, undertones, and natural hair texture to create flattering styles with realistic proportions.

1.title: Unlimited Hairstyle Experimentation
1.description: Test hundreds of looks with Picoo AI Hairstyle Changer. From pixie cuts to bobs, shoulder-length styles, long hair, bangs, and men's fades—generate previews and iterate until you find your best match.

2.title: Try Different Hair Colors
2.description: Preview different hair colors with Picoo AI Hairstyle Changer before you dye. Try bold color changes, subtle highlights, or natural tones—then pick the look that fits your hairstyle vibe.

0.question: Is the AI Hairstyle Changer free to use?
0.answer: You can try it for free. Some advanced generations and downloads may require credits depending on your plan.

1.question: What kind of photo works best?
1.answer: Use a clear, front-facing image with good lighting and minimal blur. Avoid heavy filters for the most realistic preview.

2.question: Can I try different hair colors too?
2.answer: Yes. Describe the color in your prompt (e.g., ash brown, platinum blonde, vivid red) and the AI will preview it before you dye.

3.question: How long does it take to generate a preview?
3.answer: Most previews are ready in seconds, depending on image size and current server load.

4.question: Will it look like me or a generic filter?
4.answer: The model is designed to preserve your facial structure and overall likeness while applying style and color changes.

5.question: Can I download and share results?
5.answer: Yes—download your favorite results and share them with friends to get feedback or bring them to your stylist.

6.question: How do I write better prompts for men's hairstyles?
6.answer: Use barbering terms for clarity: fade (high/mid/low), taper, undercut, buzz/crew cut, quiff, pompadour, textured crop, slick back. Include lengths for top/sides/back (e.g., top 6–8cm, sides 3mm, tapered back) and mention parting, line-up, and texture for more accurate previews.

7.question: How do I write better prompts for women's hairstyles?
7.answer: Describe it as “length + layers + bangs + texture + color.” Specify length (bob/lob/shoulder-length/long), layering and face-framing, bang style (curtain/side-swept/airy), texture (straight/waves/curls) and volume, plus color details (dye, highlights, balayage). Add the part (middle/side) and finishing style to get a more precise preview.

prompt.label: Add hair color
prompt.help: Describe the AI hair color you want: shade, tone (warm/cool), and finish (e.g., ash brown, copper, platinum blonde). For best results with this hair color changer, mention highlights, balayage, or ombré.

howItWorks.title: Use Picoo AI Hair Color Changer In 3 Easy Steps

0.title: Upload Your Picture
0.description: Start with a clear, front-facing photo in good lighting. A better photo helps the AI hair color preview look more realistic in the hair color changer.

1.title: Describe Your Desired Hair Color
1.description: Type what AI hair color you want in natural language. Mention shade and tone (warm/cool), and add details like highlights, balayage, or ombré so the AI Hair Color Changer can match your target look.

2.title: View Your New Color Instantly
2.description: In seconds, get a realistic AI hair color preview. Save your favorites, share them for feedback, or iterate with the hair color changer until it’s perfect.

0.title: Realistic Hair Color Preview
0.description: Picoo AI Hair Color Changer preserves your face and hair texture while applying AI hair color that looks natural. This hair color changer balances lighting and undertones to keep your AI hair color preview consistent with your photo.

1.title: From Natural Shades to Bold Colors
1.description: Try AI hair color from black, brown, and blonde to vivid red, pink, or silver. This hair color changer supports highlights, balayage, and subtle tone shifts—so you can preview AI hair color without committing first.

2.title: Better Prompts, Better Results
2.description: Write better prompts for the AI Hair Color Changer: specify tone and finish (ash vs. warm, glossy vs. matte), and add technique (highlights/balayage/ombré). Small details help the hair color changer generate a better AI hair color preview.

0.question: Is the AI Hair Color Changer free to use?
0.answer: You can try it for free. Some advanced generations and downloads may require credits depending on your plan.

1.question: What kind of photo works best?
1.answer: Use a clear, front-facing image with good lighting and minimal blur. Avoid heavy filters for the most realistic AI hair color preview in the hair color changer.

2.question: Can I try highlights or balayage?
2.answer: Yes. Mention highlights, balayage, ombré, placement, and tone so the AI Hair Color Changer can generate a better AI hair color preview.

3.question: How long does it take to generate a preview?
3.answer: Most previews are ready in seconds, depending on image size and current server load.

4.question: Will it keep my hairstyle the same?
4.answer: The AI Hair Color Changer aims to preserve your original hairstyle, hair texture, and facial features while changing only the AI hair color.

5.question: Can I download and share results?
5.answer: Yes—download your favorite results and share them with friends or bring them to your stylist.

6.question: How do I write better prompts for hair colors?
6.answer: For this hair color changer, describe AI hair color as shade + tone + technique. Example: "cool ash brown with subtle face-framing highlights" or "platinum blonde, neutral tone, no yellow" for a cleaner AI hair color preview.

7.question: Can I preview bold colors realistically?
7.answer: Yes. Include the exact color and finish (e.g., vivid red, pastel pink, deep blue) and ask for a photorealistic result so the AI Hair Color Changer can produce a realistic AI hair color preview.
